_header: Fair and discrete fresh womanly creature
Note:
Ringler Jr. (1992)
XRingler Jr., William A. Bibliography and Index of English Verse in Manuscript 1501-1558. London: Mansell, 1992; prepared and completed by Michael Rudick and Susan J. Ringler , TM 394; cf. 1249, 3743.
_description: A lover’s offer of service — nine lines

BLAdd5665.First Lines: Fayre and discrete fresche wommanly figure…
